data.comment: The big names in today's match at Subaru Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Throw-in for Toronto at Subaru Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 4, Jair Marrufo awards Toronto a goal kick.
Toronto have a goal kick.
Kacper Przybylko's header is off-target for Philadelphia.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Toronto at Subaru Park.
In the minute 9, Free kick Philadelphia.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Jamiro Monteiro (Philadelphia) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of Toronto.
Throw-in Toronto.
Toronto's Auro has been booked in Chester.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
At Subaru Park, Philadelphia are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Philadelphia's Jakob Glesnes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toronto defender.
In the minute 20, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Toronto at Subaru Park.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 25, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 27, Sergio Santos scores to make it 1-0 at Subaru Park.
Kai Wagner with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 31, Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
In the minute 33, Important block from the Toronto defence as Kai Wagner fires in a strike for Philadelphia.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Goal! Philadelphia extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a Mark McKenzie header.
In the minute 33, Kacper Przybylko instrumental with a fine assist.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Patrick Mullins is replacing Erickson Gallardo for the away team.
In the minute 37, Kacper Przybylko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Philadelphia.
Raymon Gaddis for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jair Marrufo awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 39, In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Toronto defenders.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 42, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
At Subaru Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Subaru Park.
The second-half is underway in Chester.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
The away team have replaced Auro with Justin Morrow. This is the second substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
In the minute 46, Greg Vanney is making the team's third substitution at Subaru Park with Liam Fraser replacing Marky Delgado.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Jair Marrufo awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Goal! Jamiro Monteiro extends Philadelphia's lead to 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Kacper Przybylko.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 58, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia's Sergio Santos breaks free at Subaru Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Philadelphia take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Sergio Santos.
Great play from Kai Wagner to set up the goal.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Andre Blake (Philadelphia) has received a yellow card from Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 66, Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a fourth substitution, with Ralph Priso replacing Nick DeLeon.
Brendan Aaronson for Philadelphia drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Sergio Santos extends Philadelphia's lead to 5-0.
In the minute 68, Brendan Aaronson with an assist there.
Philadelphia make their third substitution with Andrew Wooten replacing Sergio Santos.
Cory Burke is replacing Kacper Przybylko for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 71, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
The away team replace Alejandro Pozuelo with Jahkeele Marshall-Rutty.
In the minute 73, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrick Mullins for Toronto has been booked by Jair Marrufo and receives a first yellow card.
Jack Elliott is on a sub for Jose Martinez for Philadelphia.
In the minute 75, Philadelphia are coming forward and Cory Burke gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Toronto at Subaru Park.
Toronto pushes forward through Jahkeele Marshall-Rutty, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Philadelphia drives forward and Jack Elliott gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 82, Jim Curtin is making the team's fourth substitution at Subaru Park with Ilsinho replacing Alejandro Bedoya.
The home team have replaced Brendan Aaronson with Anthony Fontana. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jim Curtin.
Free kick Toronto.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
Jair Marrufo awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Toronto at Subaru Park.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 5-0.
